recipes.name: Alexander
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

recipes.name: Americano
recipes.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Add a splash of soda water.

recipes.name: Angel Face
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Aviation
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: B52
recipes.preparation: Layer ingredients one at a time starting with Kahlúa, followed by Baileys Irish Cream and top with Grand Marnier. Flame the Grand Marnier, serve while the flame is still on, accompanied with a straw on side plate.

recipes.name: Bacardi
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Barracuda
recipes.preparation: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with sparkling wine.

recipes.name: Bellini
recipes.preparation: Pour peach puree into chilled glass and add sparkling wine. Stir gently. Variations: Puccini (fresh mandarin juice), Rossini (fresh strawberry puree), Tintoretto (fresh pomegranate juice)

recipes.name: Between the Sheets
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Black Russian
recipes.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently. Note: for White Russian, float fresh cream on the top and stir gently.

recipes.name: Bloody Mary
recipes.preparation: Stir gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass.

recipes.name: Bramble
recipes.preparation: Build over crushed ice, in a rock glass. Stir, then pour the blackberry liqueur over the top of the drink in a circular fashion.

recipes.name: Caipirinha
special_ingredients: half fresh lime cut into 4 wedges
recipes.preparation: Place lime and sugar in old fashion glass and muddle. Fill glass with ice and Cachaca (note:Caipiroska- use Vodka instead of Cachaca).

recipes.name: Casino
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Champagne Cocktail
recipes.preparation: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by pouring gently chilled champagne.

recipes.name: Clover Club
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Cosmopolitan
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a large cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Cuba Libre
recipes.preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

recipes.name: Daiquiri
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Dark 'n' Stormy
recipes.preparation: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Add rum first and top it with ginger beer.

recipes.name: Derby
recipes.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Dirty Martini
recipes.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass.

recipes.name: Dry Martini
recipes.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled martini glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

recipes.name: Espresso Martini
special_ingredients: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: French 75
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes, except for champagne. Strain into a champagne flute. Top up with champagne. Stir gently.

recipes.name: French Connection
recipes.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

recipes.name: French Martini
recipes.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

recipes.name: Gin Fizz
recipes.preparation: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into tumbler. Top with soda water.

recipes.name: God Father
recipes.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

recipes.name: God Mother
recipes.preparation: Build into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Golden Dream
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Grasshopper
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Harvey Wallbanger
recipes.preparation: Build vodka and orange juice into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently and float Galliano on top.

recipes.name: Hemingway Special
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a double cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Horse's Neck
recipes.preparation: Build into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. If required, add dashes of Angostura bitters.

recipes.name: Irish Coffee
recipes.preparation: Warm the Irish whiskey over a burner. Pour into the glass (for hot drink) hot coffee, and add a teaspoon of sugar. Float Cream on top.

recipes.name: John Collins
recipes.preparation: Build into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Add a dash of Angostura bitters. (Note: Use Old Tom Gin for Tom Collins)

recipes.name: Kamikaze
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Kir
recipes.preparation: Pour Créme de Cassis into glass, top up with white wine. For Kir Royal: Use champagne instead of white wine.

recipes.name: Lemon Drop Martini
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

recipes.name: Long Island Iced Tea
recipes.preparation: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Serve with straw.

recipes.name: Mai-tai
recipes.garnish: Pineapple spear, mint leaves and lime wedge
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into highball glass. Serve with straw.

recipes.name: Manhattan
recipes.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Margarita
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt (note:Fruit Margarita - blend selected fruit with the above recipe).

recipes.name: Mary Pickford
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Mimosa
recipes.preparation: Pour orange juice into flute and gently pour Champagne. Stir gently. Note: Buck's Fizz is a very similar cocktail but made of two parts champagne to one part orange juice.

recipes.name: Mint Julep
recipes.preparation: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is frost.

recipes.name: Mojito
recipes.preparation: Muddle mint sprigs with sugar and lime juice. Add splash of soda water and fill glass with cracked ice. Pour rum and top with soda water. Serve with straw.

recipes.name: Monkey Gland
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Moscow Mule
special_ingredients: 1 slice lime in a highball glass
recipes.preparation: Combine the vodka and ginger beer. Add lime juice.

recipes.name: Negroni
recipes.preparation: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Old Fashioned
recipes.preparation: Place sugar cube in old-fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolve. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whisky.

recipes.name: Paradise
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Pina Colada
recipes.preparation: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.

recipes.name: Pisco Sour
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled champagne flute. Dash some Angostura bitters on top.

recipes.name: Planter's Punch
recipes.preparation: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add Angostura bitters, “on top”.

recipes.name: Porto Flip
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass. Sprinkle with fresh ground nutmeg.

recipes.name: Ramos Fizz
recipes.preparation: Pour all ingredients (except soda) in a mixing glass, dry shake (no ice) for two minutes, add ice and hard shake for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice, top with soda.

recipes.name: Rose
recipes.preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Russian Spring Punch
recipes.preparation: Shake the ingredients and pour into highball glass. Top with Sparkling wine.

recipes.name: Rusty Nail
recipes.preparation: Build into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Sazerac
recipes.preparation: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Note: The original recipe changed after the American Civil War, rye whiskey substituted cognac as it became hard to obtain.

recipes.name: Screwdriver
recipes.preparation: Build into a highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently.

recipes.name: Sea Breeze
recipes.preparation: Build all ingredients in a rock glass filled with ice.

recipes.name: Sex on the Beach
recipes.preparation: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice.

recipes.name: Sidecar
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Singapore Sling
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into highball glass.

recipes.name: Spritz Veneziano
recipes.preparation: Build into an old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Top with a splash of soda water.

recipes.name: Stinger
recipes.preparation: Stir in mixing glass with ice cubes. Strain into a cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Tequila Sunrise
recipes.preparation: Build tequila and orange juice into highball with ice cubes. Add a splash of grenadine to create sunrise effect. Do not stir.

recipes.name: Tommy's Margarita
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Tuxedo
recipes.preparation: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Vampiro
special_ingredients: Few slices fresh red hot chili peppers
recipes.garnish: Lime wedge and a green or red chili
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into a highball glass, filled with ice.

recipes.name: Vesper
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Whiskey Sour
recipes.garnish: Half an orange slice and cherry
recipes.preparation: Dash egg white (Optional: if used shake little harder to foam up the egg white). Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake. Strain into cocktail glass. If served ‘On the rocks’, strain ingredients into old-fashioned glass filled with ice.

recipes.name: White Lady
recipes.preparation: Shake with ice cubes. Strain into large cocktail glass.

recipes.name: Yellow Bird
recipes.preparation: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
